Marurira—"},{"lineNumber":69192,"originalJapaneseLine":"大勢が決し、魔軍の制圧下となった、自由都市地帯。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Free Cities region, where the outcome was decided and came under demon army quickly"},{"lineNumber":69194,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍への恭順を示し、降伏が認められた街だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"show submission to the demon army and have its surrender accepted."},{"lineNumber":69195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、くっそ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, damn Next round, next."},{"lineNumber":69202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次はアウトで賭けるぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll bet on 'out' this time.\""},{"lineNumber":69203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほお。じゃあ俺はセーフにしよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Then I’ll go with 'safe.'\""},{"lineNumber":69204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いよーーっしゃオラ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright—come on!\""},{"lineNumber":69205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げぶぅっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gebu?!\""},{"lineNumber":69206,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然、魔物兵が通行人の脇腹に","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, a monster soldier delivered a fierce front kick to a passerby’s side."},{"lineNumber":69207,"originalJapaneseLine":"痛烈な前蹴りを見舞った。","translatedEnglishLine":"They landed a powerful front kick."},{"lineNumber":69208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはっ……！　か、ぁ、ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah...! U-ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":69209,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然の暴力に反応もできず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Unable to react to the sudden violence,"},{"lineNumber":69210,"originalJapaneseLine":"通行人は地面をのたうち回る。","translatedEnglishLine":"the passerby writhed on the ground."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………もう少し、早く動くはずだったのだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I was supposed to move a little faster, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肝が冷えたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That scared me out of my wits."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ビヨンホウ、おどれ…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Biyonhou, you damn...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンがおみくじ棒を抜いた時には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time Kopandon drew the fortune stick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長達は百を超えるジフテリア兵に囲まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city mayors were already surrounded by over a hundred Diphtheria soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおおっ……！？
これは無体な……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is outrageous...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……よっぽど大金積まれたか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Either they were bribed with a huge sum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも、腰が引けちまったかい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or they chickened out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ……あまり責めちゃ可哀相よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe... don't blame them too harshly, it's pitiful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器を突きつけた兵士たちを意に介さず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring the soldiers who pointed their weapons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはビヨンホウの傍らに立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha stood beside Biyonhou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前もかい、この蛇女……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You too, huh, you snake woman..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逆よ、逆。私が引き込んだのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, the opposite. I was the one who pulled him in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウさんにはご家族がいるものねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You see, Biyonhou has a family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………そういうことだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's how it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後は、自分の才覚で切り抜けてくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After this, you’ll have to get through it with your own ingenuity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はそうした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what I did."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女にケツ掻かれて泣き入れといて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You got scratched on your ass by a woman and started crying,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が才覚やねんこのドアホがッ！　死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of ingenuity are you talking about, you idiot! Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウが手を上げると兵士達は都市長を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Biyonhou raised his hand, the soldiers began to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拘束しはじめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: restrain the city mayors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、交渉の余地はあるのではないですかな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-there should still be room for negotiation, right?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私とジオは、誰とでも協調を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geo and I are willing to cooperate with anyone...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと！　女性は丁寧に扱いなさい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! Treat the women with respect!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親御さんにそう習わなかったの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn’t your parents teach you that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、ランス、ッ…………！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance, Lance...!"
...I'm sorry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セキガハラにて、自由都市連合軍壊滅。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Sekigahara, the Free Cities Allied Army was annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時に指導者は全て死亡、あるいは捕縛され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, all their leaders were either killed or captured,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連合軍は体勢を立て直す事さえ許されなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the allied forces were not even allowed to reorganize.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セキガハラの惨劇。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Tragedy of Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後世そう呼ばれることになったこの戦いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From this battle later called that by posterity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯全域で魔軍の旗がなびくまで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: until the demon army’s flag fluttered across the entire Free Cities region,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから一週間も必要とはしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it didn’t even take a week.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市が、魔軍に制圧された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities were subdued by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、マルリラ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City, Marurira—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勢が決し、魔軍の制圧下となった、自由都市地帯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities region, where the outcome was decided and came under demon army control.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中でも、このマルリラはいち早く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them, Marurira was one of the first to quickly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍への恭順を示し、降伏が認められた街だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: show submission to the demon army and have its surrender accepted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、くっそ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこで持ちこたえないなんてよー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We shouldn't have failed to hold out there..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わはは、賭けは俺の勝ちだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahaha, that means I win the bet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が物顔で道の真ん中を歩く魔物兵を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying not to see the monster soldier walking arrogantly in the middle of the road,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界に入れないようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: passersby hurriedly walked past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通行人はそそくさと歩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The passersby hurriedly walked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー。じゃあ次だ次。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. Next round, next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はアウトで賭けるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll bet on 'out' this time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほお。じゃあ俺はセーフにしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Then I’ll go with 'safe.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いよーーっしゃオラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright—come on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げぶぅっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gebu?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、魔物兵が通行人の脇腹に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a monster soldier delivered a fierce front kick to a passerby’s side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛烈な前蹴りを見舞った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They landed a powerful front kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはっ……！　か、ぁ、ぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah...! U-ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然の暴力に反応もできず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to react to the sudden violence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通行人は地面をのたうち回る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the passerby writhed on the ground.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………もう少し、早く動くはずだったのだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I was supposed to move a little faster, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肝が冷えたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That scared me out of my wits."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ビヨンホウ、おどれ…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Biyonhou, you damn...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンがおみくじ棒を抜いた時には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time Kopandon drew the fortune stick,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長達は百を超えるジフテリア兵に囲まれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city mayors were already surrounded by over a hundred Diphtheria soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおおっ……！？
これは無体な……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is outrageous...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……よっぽど大金積まれたか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Either they were bribed with a huge sum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも、腰が引けちまったかい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or they chickened out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ……あまり責めちゃ可哀相よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe... don't blame them too harshly, it's pitiful."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器を突きつけた兵士たちを意に介さず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring the soldiers who pointed their weapons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチューシャはビヨンホウの傍らに立った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha stood beside Biyonhou.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前もかい、この蛇女……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You too, huh, you snake woman..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逆よ、逆。私が引き込んだのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, the opposite. I was the one who pulled him in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウさんにはご家族がいるものねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You see, Biyonhou has a family."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………そういうことだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's how it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後は、自分の才覚で切り抜けてくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After this, you’ll have to get through it with your own ingenuity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はそうした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what I did."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女にケツ掻かれて泣き入れといて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You got scratched on your ass by a woman and started crying,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が才覚やねんこのドアホがッ！　死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of ingenuity are you talking about, you idiot! Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビヨンホウが手を上げると兵士達は都市長を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Biyonhou raised his hand, the soldiers began to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拘束しはじめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: restrain the city mayors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、交渉の余地はあるのではないですかな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: T-there should still be room for negotiation, right?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私とジオは、誰とでも協調を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Geo and I are willing to cooperate with anyone...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっと！　女性は丁寧に扱いなさい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey! Treat the women with respect!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親御さんにそう習わなかったの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn’t your parents teach you that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、ランス、ッ…………！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance, Lance...!"
...I'm sorry..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セキガハラにて、自由都市連合軍壊滅。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Sekigahara, the Free Cities Allied Army was annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同時に指導者は全て死亡、あるいは捕縛され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the same time, all their leaders were either killed or captured,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連合軍は体勢を立て直す事さえ許されなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the allied forces were not even allowed to reorganize.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セキガハラの惨劇。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Tragedy of Sekigahara.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後世そう呼ばれることになったこの戦いから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From this battle later called that by posterity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯全域で魔軍の旗がなびくまで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: until the demon army’s flag fluttered across the entire Free Cities region,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから一週間も必要とはしなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it didn’t even take a week.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市が、魔軍に制圧された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities were subdued by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市、マルリラ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City, Marurira—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大勢が決し、魔軍の制圧下となった、自由都市地帯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities region, where the outcome was decided and came under demon army control.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中でも、このマルリラはいち早く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among them, Marurira was one of the first to quickly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍への恭順を示し、降伏が認められた街だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: show submission to the demon army and have its surrender accepted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、くっそ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこで持ちこたえないなんてよー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We shouldn't have failed to hold out there..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わはは、賭けは俺の勝ちだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahaha, that means I win the bet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が物顔で道の真ん中を歩く魔物兵を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying not to see the monster soldier walking arrogantly in the middle of the road,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視界に入れないようにして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: passersby hurriedly walked past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通行人はそそくさと歩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The passersby hurriedly walked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー。じゃあ次だ次。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. Next round, next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はアウトで賭けるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll bet on 'out' this time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほお。じゃあ俺はセーフにしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Then I’ll go with 'safe.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いよーーっしゃオラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright—come on!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げぶぅっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gebu?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、魔物兵が通行人の脇腹に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a monster soldier delivered a fierce front kick to a passerby’s side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 痛烈な前蹴りを見舞った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They landed a powerful front kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはっ……！　か、ぁ、ぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah...! U-ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然の暴力に反応もできず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to react to the sudden violence,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通行人は地面をのたうち回る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the passerby writhed on the ground.
